name: Jounce (Jelly-Bounce)
description:
Submission for GMTKJam 2018.

In this game Jelly bounces. He can try to stop himself, but every time he does, he just looses control over his body. It's a sad live I imagine...

Thanks for G.H.Steinberg for the soundeffects!

Left/Right = Movement
Down/Space =  Stop Bouncing
